description: This source file implements advanced interface functions of the Slap Loam Client Object for Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It includes functions for container access, object location, deletion, invocation, acquisition, and release in a remote object management context. The code facilitates communication with remote services via LPC (Local Procedure Call) and IMCP (Inter-Process Communication Protocol), supporting mobility features such as object encapsulation and proxying.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapLcoLoaAcqContainerAccess(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE lpc_party_addr,char * container_name)
methods.description: Acquires access to a runtime container object maintained by a specified LPC party, establishing communication via IMCP and LPC protocols.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLcoLoaRelContainerAccess(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE lpc_party_addr,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapContainer)
methods.description: Releases access to a previously acquired container object, informing the remote LPC party.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLcoLoaLocateObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * obj_name,char ** lpc_party_name,ANSC_HANDLE * lpc_party_addr)
methods.description: Locates a runtime object record by name, potentially initiating remote communication to resolve and retrieve LPC party address and name.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLcoLoaDeleteObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE lpc_party_addr,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapObject)
methods.description: Deletes a runtime object record via remote call, handling mobility if enabled, and performing necessary cleanup.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLcoLoaInvokeObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE lpc_party_addr,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapObject,char * method_name,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_in,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST ** params_out,SLAP_VARIABLE ** return_var,BOOL bTranslate,ULONG ulTimeout)
methods.description: Invokes a method on a remote SLAP object, supporting parameter marshalling, response processing, and optional mobility features.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapLcoLoaAcqObjectAccess(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE lpc_party_addr,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapContainer,char * obj_name)
methods.description: Acquires access to a specific runtime SLAP object, creating a local stub if necessary, and encapsulating in proxy objects for mobility.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLcoLoaRelObjectAccess(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE lpc_party_addr,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapObject)
methods.description: Releases access to a runtime SLAP object, updating reference counts and handling mobility encapsulation.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLcoLoaRelObjectAccess2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE lpc_party_addr,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapObject)
methods.description: Releases access to a runtime SLAP object record directly, without translation or caching, for internal release operations.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLcoLoaFlushAllObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Releases all cached LOA objects maintained by the client.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLcoLoaEnrollMobileObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hObjDescr)
methods.description: Registers an object descriptor with the mobility subsystem if mobility support is enabled.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapLcoLoaUnbindMobileObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * obj_name)
methods.description: Unbinds a mobile object descriptor by name, removing it from the mobility subsystem if active.

methods.name: BOOL SlapLcoLoaVerifyMobileObject(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * obj_name)
methods.description: Verifies whether a given object name is recognized as a mobile object via the mobility subsystem.

ctags.name: SlapLcoLoaInvokeObject
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE lpc_party_addr,ANSC_HANDLE hSlapObject,char * method_name,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST * params_in,SLAP_PARAMETER_LIST ** params_out,SLAP_VARIABLE ** return_var,BOOL bTranslate,ULONG ulTimeout)
